Install Using Conda (Advanced)Â¶

It is also possible to install SimNIBS using the Conda package manager, present for example in the Anaconda and Miniconda Python distributions.

  1. Go to the latest release page

  2. Download the environment_*.yml file for your operating system

  3. Create and activate the simnibs_env conda environment

conda env create -f environment_*.yml
conda activate simnibs_env

  1. Install SimNIBS using pip

pip install -f https://github.com/simnibs/simnibs/releases/latest simnibs

  1. (Optional) to install the Menu icons, set-up file associations, the matlab library and add SimNIBS binaries to the system path, run the postinstall_simnibs script. Type postinstall_simnibs -h for help
